title: Redeemed Neo PAX Sivir Skin Code not working
body:
I went to PAX West, got my skin card from my swag bag. I came home, followed instructions on the card (go to in-store game, click on Accounts, enter in the code from the card). It said it was successful. I go to join a game, I picked Sivir. The skin for Neo PAX is grayed out and has a lock on it.

I've logged in and out several times. I am in NA so I would be on NA servers. Why am I not able to play with the Neo PAX skin? I am thoroughly confused.

Someone please halp.

replies.body: Are you sure you have the skin selected?  There are two versions of the skin and you might need that scroll around to find it

It took me three games to realize ^^ this was my problem! You have to just scroll through. 

First I thought it was an aram bug, but went in to normals pissed. Saw your comment, and I feel slightly dumb.
I just double-checked for you and it looks like that Neo Pax Skin was added correctly, you've even used it once! Let me know if you're still not seeing it though.
